name: Big Jaws
text: When the monster turns to your sector, you may exhaust this card to deal 2 damage for each heart in your discard pile.

name: Big Jaws
text: When the monster turns to your sector, you may exhaust this card to deal 4 damage for each heart in your discard pile.

name: Big Jaws
text: When the monster turns to your sector, you may exhaust this card to deal 6 damage for each heart in your discard pile.

name: Blackspin
text: When you empty your deck, you may reveal a club from your hand to deal 4 damage.

name: Blackspin
text: When you empty your deck, deal 5 damage for each club in your hand.

name: Blackspin
text: When you empty your deck, deal 7 damage for each club in your hand. If this inflicts a wound, inflict vulnerable.

name: Bloodseeker
text: When you avoid attrition damage, deal 1 damage for each diamond in your discard pile.

name: Bloodseeker
text: When you avoid attrition damage, deal 2 damage for each diamond in your discard pile.

name: Bloodseeker
text: When you avoid attrition damage, deal 3 damage for each diamond in your discard pile.

name: Boomerang
text: At the end of your action phase, if the first and last cards in your sequence are club, deal 1 damage for each card in your sequence.

name: Boomerang
text: At the end of your action phase, if the first and last cards in your sequence are club, deal 2 damage for each card in your sequence.

name: Boomerang
text: At the end of your action phase, if the first and last cards in your sequence are club, deal 3 damage for each card in your sequence.

name: Coral Trident
text: Your action cards are considered to have an additional stamina icon for the purpose of riding checks.

name: Coral Trident
text: When you deal damage to the monster through a riding check, increase that damage by 4. Your action cards are considered to have an additional stamina icon for the purpose of riding checks.

name: Coral Trident
text: When you deal damage to the monster through a riding check, increase that damage by 7. Your action cards are considered to have an additional stamina icon for the purpose of riding checks.

name: Crystal Spear
text: Start: If you have diamond diamond diamond in your hand, you may discard one of those cards to deal 6 damage.

name: Crystal Spear
text: Start: If you have diamond diamond diamond in your hand, you may discard one of those cards to deal 9 damage. If this inflicts a wound, inflict vulnerable.

name: Crystal Spear
text: Start: If you have diamond diamond diamond in your hand, you may discard one of those cards to deal 12 damage. If this inflicts a wound, inflict vulnerable.

name: Electric Dagger
text: When you avoid attrition damage, you may choose and discard a behavior card in play. If you do, replenish its behavior slot with the top card of the behavior deck.

name: Electric Dagger
text: When you avoid attrition damage, deal 4 damage. Then you may choose and discard a behavior card in play. If you do, replenish its behavior slot with the top card of the behavior deck.

name: Electric Dagger
text: When you avoid attrition damage, deal 4 damage for each sun in your sequence. Then you may choose and discard a behavior card in play. If you do, replenish its behavior slot with the top card of the behavior deck.

name: Electric Whip
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may discard a diamond from your hand to increase its boost cost by 1.

name: Electric Whip
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may discard a diamond from your hand to increase its boost cost by 1. If you do, deal 3 damage.

name: Electric Whip
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may discard a diamond from your hand to increase its boost cost by 1. If you do, deal 3 damage for each diamond in your discard pile.

name: Explosive
text: Start: You may exhaust this card to deal 5 damage. If this inflicts a wound, confuse the monster.

name: Explosive
text: Start: You may exhaust this card to deal 10 damage. If this inflicts a wound, stun and confuse the monster.

name: Explosive
text: Start: You may exhaust this card to deal 15 damage. If this inflicts a wound, stun and confuse the monster.

name: Feathered Coat
text: When you move, if you are not the aggro player, you may reveal a club from your hand to ignore the movement cost.

name: Feathered Coat
text: When you move, you may reveal a club from your hand to ignore the movement cost.

name: Feathered Coat
text: When you move, you may reveal a club from your hand to ignore the movement cost. When you would trigger a behavior card with the wolf reaction, you may reveal club club from your hand. If you do, discard that behavior card instead and replenish its behavior slot (max: 1 per round).

name: Frozen Boots
text: Ignore the effects of water and ice terrains.

name: Frozen Boots
text: Ignore the effects of water, ice and sand terrains.

name: Frozen Boots
text: Ignore the effects of water, ice, sand and swamp terrains.

name: Gauntlet of Shell Blade
text: When you avoid attrition damage, add the top card of your discard pile to your hand. If that card is a diamond, deal 3 damage.

name: Gauntlet of Shell Blade
text: When you avoid attrition damage, add the top card of your discard pile to your hand. If that card is a diamond, deal 5 damage.

name: Gauntlet of Shell Blade
text: When you avoid attrition damage, add the top card of your discard pile to your hand. If that card is a spade, deal 7 damage.

name: Iron Greaves
text: Your health value is increased by 2. When you are KO'd, exhaust this card.

name: Iron Greaves
text: Your health value is increased by 4. When you are KO'd, exhaust this card.

name: Iron Greaves
text: Your health value is increased by 6. When you are KO'd, exhaust this card.

name: Lava Buckler
text: Setup: Place 2 counters on this card. When you would suffer attrition damage, you may remove a counter from Lava Buckler and discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a sun, prevent that damage.

name: Lava Buckler
text: Setup: Place 2 counters on this card. When you would suffer wound, you may remove a counter from Lava Buckler and discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a sun, prevent that damage.

name: Lava Buckler
text: Setup: Place 2 counters on this card. When you would suffer wound, you may remove a counter from Lava Buckler. If you do, discard a card either from your hand or from the top of your deck. If that card is a sun, prevent that damage.

name: Shimmering Boots
text: When you move, you may name a color and then discard the top card of your deck. If that card matches the color named, ignore the movement cost.

name: Shimmering Boots
text: Action: Move (max: once per turn). When you move, you may name a color and then discard the top card of your deck. If that card matches the color named, ignore the movement cost.

name: Shimmering Boots
text: Action: Move (max: once per turn). When you move, you may name a color and then discard up to 2 cards from the top of your deck. If at least one of the discarded cards matches the color named, ignore the movement cost.

name: Skeletal Spear
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may exhaust this card if you are in the front sector. If you do, deal 7 damage and cancel the effects of that behavior card.

name: Skeletal Spear
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may exhaust this card if you are in the front sector. If you do, deal 15 damage and cancel the effects of that behavior card.

name: Skeletal Spear
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may exhaust this card if you are in the front sector. If you do, deal 20 damage and cancel the effects of that behavior card.

name: Woltyar Gauntlet
text: Heart: If you paid with a spade, increase the damage the attack deals by 2.

name: Woltyar Gauntlet
text: Heart: If you paid with a spade, increase the damage the attack deals by 4.

name: Woltyar Gauntlet
text: Heart: If you paid with a spade, increase the damage the attack deals by 6.

name: Wristbow
text: Sun: If you paid with a diamond, deal 1 damage.

name: Wristbow
text: Sun: If you paid with a diamond, deal 2 damage.

name: Wristbow
text: Sun: If you paid with a diamond, deal 3 damage.
